string-array.name: questionArray
string-array.item: Question: Which of the following are examples of symptoms?
Question: Which of the following are contained within the Mediastinum?
Question: Which of the following directional terms are matched correctly?
Option: Medial - nearer to the waist
Option: Proximal - nearer to the attachment of limb to the trunk
Option: Deep - toward the surface of the body
Option: Ipsilateral - on opposite sides of the body
Option: Anterior - nearer to or at the front of the body
Option: Dorsal - Nearer to or at the back of the body
Ans: Proximal - nearer to the attachment of limb to the trunk
Ans: Anterior - nearer to or at the front of the body
Ans: Dorsal - Nearer to or at the back of the body
Question: Which of the following is not matched correctly?
Question: The midsagittal plane divides the body into:
Question: Which system contains the hormone producing glands?
Question: The science of the bodyâ€™s structures and their relationships is ___________.
Question: Interstitial Fluid, Blood Plasma, Lymph, Cerebrospinal Fluid and Synovial Fluid are all examples of _______?
Question: The serous membrane of the abdominal cavity is the __________.
Question: A __________ feedback system strengthens or reinforces a change in a controlled condition.
